parameters.name: DestinationRegionIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the destination nodes.

parameters.name: Namespaces
parameters.description: An array that consists of queried namespaces.

parameters.name: RedundantNum
parameters.description: The number of redundant replicas to support rapid deployment.

parameters.name: SDGId
parameters.description: The ID of the SDG for which data is preloaded.
